sense.def:
-ly
dodamo pridevnikom, kadar tvorimo prislove, ki opisujejo način ali naravo nekega dejanja. Na primer:
rudely
pomeni grobo. Takih prislovov v tem slovarju ponavadi ne razlagamo, temveč jih obravnavamo pri ustreznih pridevnikih.

seg.quote: He walked slowly down the street.
‘I was hoping you would,’ Morris said mischievously.
